page.title: 04TOURISM,WESTER ROSS.
page.content:
Ullapool is an ideal centre from which to visit the Falls of Measach in the 150 feet deep,mile-long Corrieshalloch Gorge,the beautiful,sub-tropical gardens at Inverewe,the Lael Forest garden,Inverpolly Nature Reserve,the Knockan Nature Conservancy Centre, Inchnadamph caves,the white-fish port of Lochinver and the Kylesku Bridge which was opened in 1984 by Her Majesty,The Queen.
Every Saturday evening,during the summer season,the Ullapool Junior Pipe Band and Highland Dancers entertain the public with a display of piping and dancing. These youngsters have been privileged to perform several times before Her Majesty,The Queen Mother,at Castle Mey in Caithness.
